t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_2::goal: Summarize what happened in one shot.
t_news_breaking_video::text_card_0::text: A breaking news video report requires a narration that explains what is happening, summarizing the key points, main actors, and any information known so far. The reporter must show what can be seen on the ground where the news happened. Shoot clips that show the basic facts and if possible interview a witness.
t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_3::goal: Show the results of what happened.

t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_0::goal: Show the location. Capture details that show where you are.
t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_4::goal: If possible, interview somewhat affected at the scene.
t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_6::goal: Show the location, use a new angle to show where you are.
t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_1::goal: Show the reactions of those affected.
t_news_breaking_video::clip_card_5::goal: Capture something that shows why you think this news is important.
